Address.Address1: Via del Gualdo, 2, Castiglione della Pescaia, Punta Ala,

Description.Text: Facilities The hotel offers travellers a total of 130 rooms. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Most of the storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a bar, multilingual staff and room service. Wireless internet access is available to travellers. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation free. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service (no extra charge) to explore the surrounding area. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. The rooms each feature a sofabed. Cots are available for younger guests. A safe and a minibar are also available. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment The hotel features a pool, a children's pool and an indoor pool. Sun loungers and parasols are ideal for relaxation. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. A variety of sporting activities, such as biking/mountain biking, golf and horse riding, or for a fee, tennis, are offered at the establishment. With windsurfing, sailing, snorkelling, diving and aquafit, fans of water sports will have plenty to choose from. Sport and leisure facilities at the accommodation include a gym, table tennis and aerobics. Various wellness options are available at the hotel, including a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon, massage treatments and a solarium. Entertainment facilities include a kids' club. Meals Half board is bookable. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast or dinner.
